data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Hugli, West Bengal, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hugli, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Hugli, West Bengal, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Hugli, West Bengal, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, guide seekers in Hugli, West Bengal, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 60,710 believers in the county of Hugli the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, I pray that the Raju people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Raju people know you.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Hugli, West Bengal, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Hugli, West Bengal, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Hugli unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Hugli
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Bhat, Tanti (Hindu traditions), Mahli, Mahanta, Bania Bais
